creditline: Gift of funds from John E. Andrus III
description: man with long sideburns, wearing a coat, vest, tie and top hat, looking up; wood structure at R
inscription:
Title, inscription, stamp

ULC, in the plate: [58-95 (backwards)]; below image, impressed in paper: [DE GONCOURT.]
signed: LRC, in pencil: [Inspecteur prevides travaux publics (?) 2041]
title: Inspecteur privé des travaux publics, Plate 13 from "Les Toquades"
